Text: Draft of ETS Presentation for Houston Analyst Meetingis the latest draft for the Houston Analyst Meeting I am going to give a copy to Stan on Wed and may review with him on Thursday Let me know if you have comments Scott Tracy do you have a volume estimate for
ROEs Cc Mark K asked me to get our best estimate of ROEs by pipe not for public but what we look at internally I know this is a sensitive issue Scott x

Draft of ETS Presentation for Houston Analyst Meetingis the latest draft for the Houston Analyst Meeting I am going to give a copy to Stan on Wed and may review with him on Thursday Let me know if you have comments Scott Tracy do you have a volume estimate for

EOTT Price Increase Cc I discussed the increase in EOTTs unit price up on relatively normal volume of units at CST with Frank Delaney of Spear Leads He indicated Merrill Lynch has an order to buy units with a limit and Golman Sachs has an order to buy units with a bid This is obviously very good news and probably indicates at least a couple S Corptype buyers are beginning to accumulate sizable positions Please keep this information confidential Scott

EOTT Energy QA Cc the responses we provided to the Oil Gas Investor These responses will be used for EOTTs section pages in the MLP supplement which will be part of the Oil Gas Investors May issue In addition to the information we are providing AG Edwards will create a report on each participating MLP Scott Forwarded by Scott VonderheideCorpEnron on AM Scott Vonderheide AM To cc Subject EOTT Energy QA Nissa As requested attached are EOTT Energy Partners LPs responses to the questions for the AG Edwards report Also I sent a black and white photo of Mike Burke President and CEO of EOTT to your attention mail Please call me at if you have any questions or if you need additional information Scott Vonderheide Director Investor Relations

EOTT new analyst at Merrill Lynch Cc I spoke with Andrew Fairbanks the Merrill Lynch analyst that is going to start covering EOTT He will take over coverage of several MLPs including Plains Teppco and Lakehead The transition will probably happen sometime in March I suggested he visit the EOTT offices to meet management He will probably take me up on the offer sometime in early March I am sending him historical information on EOTT as well as the presentation I prepared for AG Edwards Scott

EOTT Earnings Release and Conference Call Cc quarter earnings release is scheduled for Monday May before the market opens We will also host a conference call at EOTTs offices on May to discuss first quarter results The call is tentatively scheduled for AM CST Mike Burke Dana Gibbs Susan Ralph and Lori Maddox should plan meet in the conference room by Mikes office to minutes before the call begins others copied on this note do not need to attend but are welcome to call in or listen over the webcast info to follow on dialin numberinstructions Scott Vonderheide

Draft of response after May Cc a first pass at suggested responses assuming we do not file the Q on or before May Kathryn Corbally will coordinate comments from the IR side Lori is coordinating comments with AA Steve could you coordinate with Bob BairdRex Rogers If you need to reach Kathryn her direct line is Thanks Scott Suggested comment if EOTT has not filed the Q on May we will only provide response if asked We are continuing our review of the implementation of our new marketing and accounting systems We expect to have our analysis complete and the Form Q finalized by June If specifically asked about the issues under investigation We implemented a new marketing and accounting system in November of As we stated in our first quarter earnings release we are specifically reviewing integration issues related to the to this implementation If asked about the magnitude of possible adjustments We need to complete our investigation before we can answer specific questions on what adjustments if any would be appropriate The required review is labor intensive We are working very diligently and will provide the information as soon as possible

Dain Rauscher note on EOTTthe attached note all analysts estimates posted on First Call are after the marktomarket impact After third quarter earnings were released we told the analysts few transactions would be markedtomarket at year end As a result we would expect marktomarket to be negative in the fourth quarter also With Dain Rauschers revisions the concensus is for the fourth quarter of and for the full year Scott Forwarded by Scott VonderheideCorpEnron on PM Easterbrook Mark ainRauschercom on AM To Scott D Vonderheide Email cc Subject FW B Aggr REJIGGERING EOTT ESTIMATES TO REFLECT MARKTOMARKET Mark Easterbrook CFA DRWEquity Research Dallas ph fax Original Message From mailto Sent Monday February AM To Subject EOTB Aggr REJIGGERING EOTT ESTIMATES TO REFLECT MARKTOMARKET Dain Rauscher Wessels a division of Dain Rauscher Incorporated We are adjusting our and Q earningsDCF estimates to reflect mark tomarket adjustments In marktomarket accounting should have minimal impact on current estimates We are initiating our earningsDCF estimates of per unit The acquisition environment continues to look strong EOT units have not participated in the recent uptick in the MLP group We suggest investors buy at current prices EOTT Energy Partners LP NYSEEOT Rating Buy Risk Aggressive Price Target Feb Price Wk Range Year End Dec Fiscal EPS PE E x E x E x After marktomarket impact Tr ROE Yr EPS Gr NM Shares Out million Book Value Market Cap million DIVERSIFIED NATURAL GASMLPS Mark Easterbrook CFA EOTBAggrREJIGGERING EOTT ESTIMATES TO REFLECT MARKTOMARKET Adjusting Estimates To Reflect MarkToMarket We are changing our yearend and fourthquarter estimates for EOTT Energy to reflect the impact of marktomarket noncash adjustments to reflect current value of the contract portfolio For the year we are excluding the cumulative benefit of million or per unit take in the Q However we are including the million per unit negative impact of marktomarket for the Q So our earningsdistributable cash flow DCF estimates decline to per unit from Our Q earnings estimates fall to from per unit which assumes a million negative impact from marktomarket Our earningsDCF estimate remains at per unit and we are initiating our estimates of Acquisitions Continue To Be In The Cards We have seen the partnership quadruple the amount of pipeline miles it controls to miles over the last months Continued success in integrating the Koch assets and the TexasNew Mexico Pipeline with the rest of the asset base should continue to provide cost savings and build cash flow Although management has laid low over the last six months on the acquisition front we believe there are several opportunities within the sector As we have suggested before the consolidation going on within the major oil companies may fuel the consolidation within the crude oil transportation segment Major oil companies are focusing on their strengths of EP and retail while divesting noncore assets In addition the numbers of players in the crude oil transportation business continues to diminish The balance sheet for EOTT is in good shape at a debtcapitalization percentage of EOTT could take on more acquisitions With another large acquisition we could see coverage of the distribution improve Unfortunately the unit price has fallen to unattractive levels to make acquisitions If the price of the units were to improve we could see the partnership aggressively go after other acquisitions Stock Opinion We consider the Enron support of million for distribution through March as a safety net Distributable cash flow should be able to cover the common distribution We look for yield improvement in the EOT units to yield still a discount to the peer group but an improvement over the current Using this yield valuation and the current distribution we have a month price target of per unit The units have not reacted to the improvement in the MLP arena Since the beginning of the year two shortterm trends has subsided taxloss selling and YK concerns which have helped the MLP group Even interest rate concerns seemed to wain with the reduction of the longterm bond rates However EOT units have not participated in this move We believe once the partnership reports Q results and discusses acquistiion potential the market may take notice We recommend investors take advantage of the weakness and purchase the EOT units Company Description EOTT is a major independent marketer of crude oil in North America Enron Corporation effectively holds a interest in the partnership The partnership owns or leases trucks and owns miles of intrastate and interstate pipeline and gathering systems Dain Rauscher Incorporated managed or comanaged a public offering of the securities of EOTT Energy Partners LP within the past three years Additional information on the securities mentioned is available on request This does not purport to be a complete statement of all material facts related to any company industry or security mentioned The information provided while not guaranteed as to accuracy or completeness has been obtained from sources believed to be reliable The opinions expressed reflect our judgment at this time and are subject to change without notice and may or may not be updated DRI its officers directors affiliates andor employees including the authors of this report may from time to time have a long or short position in publicly or privately issued securities of companies mentioned or derivatives thereof and may sell or buy such securities for their own or related accounts This notice shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy nor shall there be any sale of these securities in any state in which said offer solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such state Copyright Dain Rauscher Incorporated Call your DRW salesperson at EOTpdf

Equity Analyst Meeting on Feb Cc Mike and Dana Attached is the schedule for the equity analyst meetings on February We have reserved rooms for the night of February and have made all transportation arrangements in New York and St Louis Plan to meet at the Enron hangar on Wednesday February rd for a PM departure Please call me at x if there are any questions Scott Vonderheide

EOTT trading update As you may have noticed EOTT shares have been trading down over the past several days Fridays close was vs todays close of Some of the weakness may be related to concern over the Midland pipeline leak that occurred several weeks ago A message was posted on the Yahoo message board on noting the EOTT has recently had a couple of BAD pipeline leaks in West TexasNew Mexico I did not recieve any questions on the Midland leak until today In addition Jeanine Kim with PaineWebber Ron Barones analyst called today and indicated they had several calls on the leak and on the reported loss of one of EOTTs top traders in Midland I have not had any other calls pointing to other rumors that might explain the weakness The volumes traded over the last several days does not appear unusual with todays volume reported at units Scott Vonderheide
EOTT fourth quarter earnings releaseis the most current release The second paragraph has been changed to reflect the comments made at the AM meeting
Conference Call ScriptQA will follow I need to get release out Scott
